doc.field: Brendan Muckian-Bates Posters on the 2018 West Virginia Teachers' Strike
Brendan Muckian-Bates Posters on the 2018 West Virginia Teachers' Strike

Brendan Muckian-Bates is a social studies teacher in West Virginia and an organizer with the West Virginia Education Association (WVEA) and Industrial Workers of the World. Muckian-Bates was an active participant in the 2018 West Virginia Teachers' Strike, and wrote about his experiences in Jacobin and the Socialist Worker. This collection consists of posters collected by Brendan Muckian-Bates from the strikes. Posters contain messages of general support for the teachers, as well as specific demands concerning salary and health insurance.

This collection consists of posters collected by Brendan Muckian-Bates from the 2018 West Virginia Teachers' Strike. Posters contain messages of general support for the teachers, as well as specific demands concerning salary and health insurance.

Brendan Muckian-Bates is a social studies teacher in West Virginia and an organizer with the West Virginia Education Association (WVEA) and Industrial Workers of the World. He served as the PAC President of Monongalia County and as a delegate to the WVEA Delegate Assembly. Muckian-Bates was an active participant in the 2018 West Virginia Teachers' Strike, and wrote about his experiences in Jacobin and the Socialist Worker.
Source: "Brendan Muckian-Bates," Keep Left Speakers, accessed April 15, 2019, http://keepleft.info/speaker/brendan-muckian-bates/.
Donated by Brendan Muckian-Bates in July 2018; the accession number associated with this gift is 2019.053.
